parameters.query:
SELECT 
  up.style_preferences,
  up.color_preferences,
  up.body_type,
  up.budget_range,
  p.full_name
FROM user_profiles up
LEFT JOIN profiles p ON up.user_id = p.id
WHERE up.user_id = '{{ $json.userId }}'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  fi.id,
  fi.name,
  fi.price,
  fi.images,
  fi.colors,
  b.name as brand_name
FROM fashion_items fi
LEFT JOIN brands b ON fi.brand_id = b.id
WHERE fi.is_active = true
{% if $('message-processor').item.json.conversationData.entities.colors.length > 0 %}
  AND fi.colors && ARRAY[{% for color in $('message-processor').item.json.conversationData.entities.colors %}'{{ color }}'{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}]
{% endif %}
ORDER BY fi.popularity_score DESC
LIMIT 6;
